title: Jonyshake71
author: Jonyshake71
content: There are thousands of altcoins in crypto market and each of coin has investors! Cause people have different choice from one to another.  People even invest in shitcoin to get rich quickly. So what are the names of your most 5 invested altcoins that you are holding or would like to invest soon?? Those are my choice1. ETH 2. BNB3. Arbitrum4. Cake5. ApeCoin

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: Jonyshake71 on August 09, 2023, 09:10:38 AMThere are thousands of altcoins in crypto market and each of coin has investors! Cause people have different choice from one to another.  People even invest in shitcoin to get rich quickly. So what are the names of your most 5 invested altcoins that you are holding or would like to invest soon?? Those are my choice1. ETH 2. BNB3. Arbitrum4. Cake5. ApeCoinI will tell you my top five for the next bull market. I selected the below altcoins due to their unique use case. 1. ETH2. BNB3. ARB4. OP5, ZRO(Layerzero soon)

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: I only have the top 2 and it's also on your list. Ethereum and BNB. These two coins are my chances to get back whatever I regretted before because of not trusting Bitcoin and Ethereum back when they were still cheap. BNB especially has a higher chance but due to what SEC is doing to them cornering Binance, it might take longer than what I am expecting. Well, I do know they could win the case but there will be doubts from retail investors that could ruin the value of it and the reputation. Although I like the fact that XRP partially won their case which gives an optimistic view that other coins that is being attacked by SEC can also do the same.

comments.author: Questat
comments.body: ETH and BNB are the most reliable and trusted altcoins that exist in the crypto market. But to tell you OP, as an investor, it was not just we choose altcoins to invest in because we've trusted them but for us to see if that project is worth investing in and profitable. Because smart investors don't just look at what will happen today or in the future and so they secure buying trusted coins but they look for every opportunity to earn whether it was meme coins, shitcoins, or potential projects.

comments.author: gurunanakji777
comments.body: I believe numerous investors still hold the belief that they will witness the same initial performance as Shiba Inu did with other meme coins. However, it's evident that most investors have experienced losses. This is why I maintain a stronger faith in alternative coins rather than meme coins. At present, my focus is on BNB, Matic, XRP, Ada, and Ethereum.

comments.author: lamtraung9aj
comments.body: I think it's all. Your investment capital will gradually increase according to the capitalization of each project.

comments.author: fmz89
comments.body: some og alt like DOGE supported by elon and many meme lover, LTC usefull gain many support from chinese community and it was test bench for btc new techXMR is always first choice for anon coin and widely adoption in darknetETH is the last alt to be trusted and mostly is the second choice beyond BTC

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: Well, as far as altcoins or non-BTC crypto-assets can be concerned, I do trust the top 2 namely, Ethereum and BNB and I am holding some of them though not in a way that can make me really rich. I believe in their stability so far and I think they are helmed by credible people who will not easily turned things ugly so we can say that their future can be solid, bright and prosperous. Now, the other three would be: XRP, Polygon and SOL. Of course, we are now flooded with altcoins as a new one is born almost everyday so we have to be careful because not all of them can make it beyond inception.

comments.author: Jocuserious
comments.body: Best tokens in your list ETH, BNB, ARB always and it's totally my favorite. Moreover if you want, you can buy these coins keeping in mind the thought of bull market. but there is no reason to be surprised, it is natural that the price of these coins is much higher now. On the other hand many new meme coins are entering the market now, so if you have a large amount of capital you can collect some meme coins for future bull markets. But all these new meme coins have risk but if one coin will jump hits then you might be rich.

comments.author: Fuso.hp
comments.body: Quote from: Jonyshake71 on August 09, 2023, 09:10:38 AMThere are thousands of altcoins in crypto market and each of coin has investors! Cause people have different choice from one to another.  People even invest in shitcoin to get rich quickly. So what are the names of your most 5 invested altcoins that you are holding or would like to invest soon?? Those are my choice1. ETH 2. BNBIf ALT coins are in the list of favorites then these coins will be named above and I don't trust the other three ALT coins you mentioned. BNB Ethereum If asked to choose an ALT coin next, Matic would be on my list of choices. I would always suggest Bitcoin as an investment, but if one has more money to invest, these three coins can be invested in alongside Bitcoin. If these three coins can be invested then I think good things can be expected from these three coins because these three coins are not coins to lose from the market. Those who believe in ALT coins can think about these three coins if they want. I hope your thoughts will match with mine and you will also like these three coins.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB) and Arbitrum (ARB) are still my favorites from your list, but for real PancakeSwap (CAKE) and ApeCoin (APE) ? what do you think is good about the two tokens at the moment, their hype has passed and slowly their market capitalization is also decreasing, so it's not a wise choice to choose them as investment. For me, Oasis Network (ROSE) is still the main altcoin in my portfolio, this coin seems to be undervalued since its launch, I will wait until the next bull market comes.

comments.author: bussybuddy
comments.body: It is true that, in retrospect, a lot of people regret having missed out on investing in Bitcoin and Ethereum before, when they were cheap. Binance Coin is being considered as a more potential opportunity, but yes, the current situation with the SEC interfering in Binance operations could create an uncertain situation. This interference may affect the value and reputation of Binance Coin.Regarding XRP partially winning the lawsuit, this could fuel optimism that other coins hit by the SEC are likely to do the same. However, the situation may vary from case to case, due to the complexity of legal factors and the specific situation.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: I'm not a big fan of altcoins, as I mostly focus in Bitcoin investment, so I only adopted few altcoins so far. They are Ethereum, FUN token and a minor portion of CRO token from Crypto.com platform, as I had to stake there to acquire the debit crypto card, but that is all. And to say the truth, if I could get rid of CRO I would do it right now, remaining only with ETH and FUN investments on my altcoins' portfolio. ETH, because it's the top 2 cryptocurrency since a long ago, probably not losing its spot for any other crypto any time soon and FUN because the benefits it proportionates through the premium program at Freebitco.in for long term Bitcoin holders/investors.

comments.author: HONDACD125
comments.body: Quote from: Jonyshake71 on August 09, 2023, 09:10:38 AMThere are thousands of altcoins in crypto market and each of coin has investors! Cause people have different choice from one to another.  People even invest in shitcoin to get rich quickly. So what are the names of your most 5 invested altcoins that you are holding or would like to invest soon?? Those are my choice1. ETH 2. BNB3. Arbitrum4. Cake5. ApeCoinYou are right that there are thousands of cryptocurrencies in the market right now.Every investor has their own choice.Shitcoin is chosen to get rich quick but the chances of getting poor quick are also very high here.I will not advise anyone to invest in shitcoin.However, a risk can be taken with a small amount which we do not worry about losing.The coins chosen for your investment are very good.Of course, in the future you will get a chance to earn a good profit from these coins.Dot, GaLa, Ocean Protocol, Matic and Mana are the top five coins I have invested and hold. I hope to make a good profit from them in the coming bull season.

comments.body: Quote from: Jonyshake71 on August 09, 2023, 09:10:38 AMThere are thousands of altcoins in crypto market and each of coin has investors! Cause people have different choice from one to another.  People even invest in shitcoin to get rich quickly. So what are the names of your most 5 invested altcoins that you are holding or would like to invest soon?? Those are my choice1. ETH 2. BNB3. Arbitrum4. Cake5. ApeCoinI am not sure how valuable Arb would be as it's mostly for voting. Unless everyone votes for a new tokenomics that makes it valuableThat being said, my list would be.ETH, Matic (because of reddit), Dusk (if they ever get to release mainnet) and UNU SED LEO (because of the tokenomics). That's it really. I don't need 5. I might play with some microcaps with the fifth of my holdings.

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Quote from: Jonyshake71 on August 09, 2023, 09:10:38 AMThere are thousands of altcoins in crypto market and each of coin has investors! Cause people have different choice from one to another.  People even invest in shitcoin to get rich quickly. So what are the names of your most 5 invested altcoins that you are holding or would like to invest soon?? Those are my choice1. ETH 2. BNB3. Arbitrum4. Cake5. ApeCoinPeople investing in shit coins are taking a very high risk, we all should know that all altcoin investments are really dangerous, and no altcoin can be trusted, but some people just like investing in altcoin, and some people prefer leaving small amount in altcoin. I don’t also trust any altcoin because I know any of them can fail us at any moment, but if am leaving any amount in any coin, then I will rather leave it in Eth and BNB. Those are the two coins which I still have little confidence in, and if am investing in any altcoin, then I will be investing small amounts of money in the two coins, or I will be choosing one of it.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: Jonyshake71 on August 09, 2023, 09:10:38 AM1. ETH 2. BNBThis is my top two options though I don't fully trust them, I just took the risk on holding them.I also have XRP and LTC just to be able to catch with the hype of halving and the SEC result. We should not trust any altcoins, you can just invest with them but never to attached yourself with them since you are going to sell it and take profit no matter what, its just a matter of time so better not to be too emotional and just focus on the real goal, which is to make profit. There's a lot of good coins, though I don't see shitcoins to be on my list but if there's a way to make profit, then why not.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: ETH, as usual. It's the top altcoin for a reason after all. Following that would probably BNB, Matic, and SOL? Well, the title says "trust the most" but really, they're the only altcoins I have in my portfolio that I'm willing to invest in, XRP and LTC are some of the other options but I'm still currently undecided about those two. The XRP choice seems the more solid one due to the SEC case they won over, but LTC halving is here and some are hoping for some changes for it, but again, as I've said in my previous posts about it, I have this doubt that nothing is really going to change with its market, just like in the other halvings.

comments.author: Vivageneviv
comments.body: If you are talking about the more established alts then I'd say ETH, BNB and ADA. But for the new projects with huge prospects, currently AIMBOT is one I'm convinced will be here for a long time. Learned about it when Bitget announced its listing, I took interest and researched, it appears to be aiding trading results and getting increasingly adopted

comments.author: Wahyuihib
comments.body: the answer from me seems to be very clear, right... what is certain is the coin that is in the top 10 row, of course the coin that I want to hunt for.  regardless of the highs and lows of this coin's price, that's definitely how it goes in trading.  but soon I will buy it .  because I am very afraid of taking risks
